content: slip_stitch to the first st 50 54 round 5 6 chain 1 half_double_crochet in the same st as the chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch to the first st 50 54 rounds 6-8 7-9 chain 1 half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop in each st around join with a slip_stitch to the first st 50 54 rounds 9-13 10-14 chain 2 fpdc around the first st bpdc around the next st alternate fpdc and bpdc around join with a slip_stitch to the first st 50 54 round 14 15 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same stitch as ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st 50 54 - 9 rounds 15-17 16-18 repeat rounds 6-8 7-9 50 54 rounds 18-20 19-21 chain 2 fpdc around the first st bpdc around the next st alternate fpdc and bpdc around join with a slip_stitch to the first st 50 54 fo and weave in ends - 10 x-large fhdc 64 and join with slip_stitch to form a ring rounds 2-6 chain 2 fpdc around the first st bpdc around the next st alternate fpdc bpdc around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 round 7 chain 1 half_double_crochet in the same st as the chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 rounds 8-10 chain 1 half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 rounds 11-15 chain 2 fpdc around the first st bpdc around the next st alternate fpdc and bpdc around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 round 16 half_double_crochet in the same st as the chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 rounds 17-19 repeat rounds 8-10 join with slip_stitch to first st 64 - 11 rounds 20-24 repeat rounds 11-15 64 round 25 half_double_crochet in the same st as the chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to first st 64 fo and weave in ends - 12 the sugarloaf mountain dog snood pattern is the property of amethyst mermaidesigns please do not distribute the pattern as your own or change anything and say it is your own design you may sell any physical items made from the pattern but please use the original name and credit me as the designer permission is not given for mass production factory of any kind of this design as always thank you so much for purchasing my pattern i love to see all your creations please share your finished work on instagram using the hashtag #amethystmermaidesigns feel free to give me a tag for a feature in my stories as well be sure to check out my other patterns https //www ravelry com/designers/dorothy-sivo let s be friends @amethystmermaidesigns check out my facebook page amethyst mermaidesigns
